Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 410th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2017, off Daniel Senter (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2017, off Corey Tinker (DET)...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 6/8/2017...
Injured on 10/2/2017 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 7/22/2018...
9/21/2018: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $7,250,000 per year, for 1 years.
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2018...
Injured on 5/22/2019 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/5/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 8/25/2020.
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2021, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 3/24/2022 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/14/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
